issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://store-jp.nintendo.com/list/software/70050000040203.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fstore-jp.nintendo.com%2Flist%2Fsoftware%2F70050000040203.html) ### Comment > 問題発生までの経緯 > > 追加コンテンツ購入のためグーグル検索からアクセスした。 > 最初はページが表示されたが数秒後にエラーページに移動した。 「 https://store-jp.nintendo.com/on/demandware.store/Sites-MNS-Site/ja_JP/CSRF-Fail 」 > ブラウザの戻るボタンで戻っても、同様にエラーページに移動してしまった。 > AdGuardの保護を一時的に停止してから戻ったところ、ページがエラーになることなくアクセスできた。 > > アカウントには過去にログインしている状態だったと考えられる。 > この日以来(https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/151963)のアクセスだった。 ### Screenshots

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
### ATTENTION

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you're using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you're using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

Not reproduced it on my end.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

comment.body:
Ok, could you check the rules below with the AdGuard Base?
First separately, and then both.
```adblock
colonist.io#$#.textads.banner-ads.banner_ads.ad-unit.ad-zone.ad-space.adsbox { display: block !important; }
@@||cdn.jsdelivr.net/*/adb-analytics@*.min.js$domain=colonist.io
```

Реклама не повторяется с нашими фильтрами. Вы также можете установить AdGuard Extra, следуя ниже инструкции.

---

This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, please make sure that AdGuard Extra is enabled in the application settings.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

Unfortunately, the reported issue does not satisfy our [filters policy](https://kb.adguard.com/en/general/adguard-filter-policy).
This site has too little traffic.

Please add to your user rules:

```
wrestling-world.com##.sharex
wrestling-world.com##div[style*="min-height:400px;"]
wrestling-world.com##center[style*="height"]
wrestling-world.com##div[style*="width:300px;"][style*="min-height:250px;"]
wrestling-world.com##div[style*="min-height:240px;"]
```

comment.body:
I don't see the ads on iPhone.
Try to clear browser data, update the filters (wait almost one minute there), open the site.
If that doesn't work, you should re-enable the content blockers in Safari settings (wait about the same time as when you update the filters).

Можно убрать этим правилом.
```adblock
m.cyber.sports.ru##.js-active > p:contains(/^\s$/):not([class])
```

Отправлено из Mail.ru для Android понедельник, 03 июля 2023г., 16:43 +03:00 от jellizaveta  ***@***.*** :

>Статистика (3 вкладка) --> Недавняя активность. Чтобы увидеть какие рекламные запросы не блокируются, пожалуйста, очистите журнал фильтрации, потом перейдите в приложение и повторите рекламу, затем сделайте скриншот журнала фильтрации и прикрепите скриншот к комментарию на github.

comment.body:
It seems that it's caused by `Web Annoyances Ultralist`, so please disable that filter list or add this rule:
```adblock
baidu.com#@$##head, .s_down, .s_form { position: relative !important; top: 0 !important; }
```
to user rules.

comment.body:
It is caused by filter `Legitimate URL Shortener`.
1. Open the webpage [https://pubs.rsc.org/en/content/articlelanding/2023/qi/d3qi00850a](https://pubs.rsc.org/en/content/articlelanding/2023/qi/d3qi00850a).
2. Click on `Log in Using your institution credentials`.
3. The newly opened page displays an error message: `Page load error`.

I don't see such a rule in my filter log, but you can try disabling it:
```
/wrapperMessagingWithoutDetection.js$domain=~autobild.de|~bike-bild.de|~bild.de|~computerbild.de|~testbild.de,badfilter
``` 
and check how disabling it affects loading.

comment.body:
This issue has been escalated to [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra):
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra/issues/452

Please wait until it is solved there.

If you’re using AdGuard for Windows, Mac or Android, you’re probably already using AdGuard Extra so you just need to wait until it is updated.

If you’re using AdGuard Browser Extension, we suggest installing AdGuard Extra in addition to it.

* [Install for Chrome, Edge or other Chromium-based browsers](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Install for Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)
